name: Elizabeth
description:
Elizabeth is a decryption leisure game.The game has fresh painting style and unique decryption method.Players need to find connections between frames and Combining picture frames to solve problems.The protagonist will walk through the picture frame.Players patiently observe the connection between the pictures, observe the details, break through many difficulties, ensure the safety of the protagonist in danger, and finally reach the end.
Now the game is the first chapter, a total of 13 preliminaries.


Why do we live more lonely when the city is bigger?

This may be the story of all of us. After leaving campus and stepping into the society, we gradually lost time and friends in the work and life of leaving early and returning late.

The protagonist is an ordinary office worker, whose day-to-day work makes him have no time to care about the colorful city. Working overtime is longer and shorter, free life is shorter and shorter, and he is trapped in a prison called reality with numerous inner demands.
Until one day, the protagonist's first encounter with a girl in the subway, like the sun after the rain, not only touched the protagonist's heart, but also ignited his yearning for free life.He resolutely left the company on a rainy night and devoted himself to love and free life.


---Interactive photos and puzzle solving---
*Drag the white frame, match the black frame and trigger interactive events to solve the puzzle.After you ensure that the protagonist can pass, press the play key, and the protagonist can smoothly go from the starting frame to the ending red frame.
*Some picture frames will have interactive effects, which can form a clever combination to help you pass.
*The game is a vector style background image with rich character animation.The puzzles of each level are very brain burning, suitable for puzzle lovers to play.
